titleStmt.title: The great gospel sumonds, to close with Christ under the pain of the highest rebellion against the God of heaven, being the substance of a preface and sermon at Hemphlar-bank in the parish of Lanrick Feb. 20, 1676 / by Mr. John Welsh ...
titleStmt.author: Welch, John, ca. 1624-1681.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
